Package module.SnWwA

Class Summary
SnWwAButton  
SnWwAMod This module is to be used for testing and demonstrating Stop-and-Wait ARQ protocol.
(Ref: Data and Computer Communication; William Stallings; 7th Ed.)
The weird SnWwA stands for Stop and Wait with Acknowledgement.
SnWwAUI
